document_title: Fatty liver: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
In the early stages, fatty liver often has no obvious symptoms, so it is difficult to diagnose. Diagnosis is based on history of drinking alcohol, or being overweight or obese... and suggesting fatty liver on ultrasound.
1.  Blood test
This is the preferred test to use, aiming to:; CBC; Check liver enzyme levels and liver function; Measure blood sugar; Check blood fat levels
2.  Test for hepatitis virus
To look for the presence of viruses that cause chronic hepatitis such as hepatitis B, hepatitis C and other liver diseases.
